Job Position: Installation Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Purpose


	To supervise, execute, and ensure quality installation and commissioning of mechanical, electrical, piping, and instrumentation systems on projects. The role requires adherence to safety, quality, and project schedules while coordinating with multidisciplinary teams and subcontractors.
	Plan, coordinate, and supervise installation and commissioning activities on site in line with project requirements.
	Interpret engineering drawings, P&amp;IDs, GA drawings, and technical specifications for execution.
	Monitor subcontractor performance and ensure compliance with HSE, quality, and project standards.
	Conduct pre-installation checks, site surveys, and readiness reviews.
	Oversee installation of piping, structural, mechanical equipment, and electrical/instrumentation systems.
	Ensure all installation works meet Nigerian and international codes/standards (ASME, API, IEC, ISO).
	Support project team in resolving site technical queries and liaising with design office for clarifications.

	Participate in Factory Acceptance Tests (FAT), Site Acceptance Tests (SAT), and commissioning activities.
	Ensure compliance with client specifications and regulatory requirements.
	Coordinate with QA/QC to ensure inspections and approvals are carried out.
	Maintain effective communication with client representatives and internal project management.

	3 years of relevant experience in projects.
	Strong knowledge of installation, construction supervision, and commissioning practices.
	Demonstrated experience in reading and interpreting engineering drawings and specifications.
	Proven track record in site supervision and subcontractor management.
	Strong HSE awareness and certifications preferred.
	Excellent communication and reporting skills.


Salary
N200,000 Monthly

Installation Engineer Job at Karbak Ventures Limited




        
    

        
        Karbak Ventures Limited (ISO NG19/90729) is an Engineering, Procurement and Construction Company, with approximately two decades of experience in Electro-Mechanical Projects for FMCG companies in West and East Africa. We have vast experience with plant/equipment installation of numerous sizes and complexity and we pride ourselves in the vast capacity built over the years in providing design, procurement and installation support to numerous FMCG firms such as Coca-Cola, Nigeria Breweries, Guinness, Friesland, PZ Wilmar, Murzah Wilmar (Tanzania), Kasapreko (Ghana), etc. and supports for OEMS such Sidel, KHS, Krones, Pentair, etc.
